thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 01 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Emerge Energy Services Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Emerge Energy Services Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.05
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Emerge Energy Services LP:
* REG-EMERGE ENERGY SERVICES ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* TOTAL VOLUMES SOLD INCREASED 7% SEQUENTIALLY TO A RECORD 1,503 THOUSAND TONS IN Q1
* “HIGHLY CONFIDENT” THAT CO WILL ACHIEVE 2018 FULL YEAR GUIDANCE OF $120 MILLION IN ADJUSTED EBITDA AND $60 MILLION IN NET INCOME
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $102.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY FRAC SAND REVENUES $106 MILLION VERSUS $75.2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
